name: o_simardcasanova
text:
@roytang On the Jack Dorsey situation…

He never had any active role in Bluesky

He authorized the project to grow inside Twitter when he was CEO, he sits on the board as an advisor, and that’s it

Bluesky has always been run by Jay Graber, one of the very few women in a position of power in the tech industry

It’s her project, not his

All the media coverage saying Bluesky is a "Jack Dorsey thing" is yet another case of "let’s attribue the work of a talented women to a man who did very little"
